00006 SpParameter::SpParameter ()
00007 {
00008     m_bHasChanged = true;
00009     m_acName = NULL;
00010     m_uiRegister = 0;
00011     m_iSize = 0;
00012     m_pvData = NULL;
00013     m_iCount = 0;
00014     m_eType = PT_NONE;
00015     m_eOption = PO_NONE;
00016 }
00017 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 SpParameter::SpParameter (const char* acName, SpParameter::Type eType,
00019     unsigned int uiRegister, int iCount, SpParameter::Option eOption)
00020 {
00021     m_acName = new char[strlen(acName)+1];
00022     strcpy(m_acName,acName);
00023 
00024     m_bHasChanged = true;
00025     m_uiRegister = uiRegister;
00026     m_iCount = iCount;
00027     m_eType = eType;
00028     m_eOption = eOption;
00029     m_iSize = getSize(eType);
00030     m_pvData = NULL;
00031 
00032     setData((void*)NULL, m_iCount, m_eType);
00033 }

00057 SpParameter::SpParameter (
00058     const char* acName,
00059     bool bEnable,
00060     unsigned int uiRegister,
00061     SpParameter::Option eOption)
00062 {
00063     m_acName = new char[strlen(acName)+1];
00064     strcpy(m_acName,acName);
00065 
00066     m_bHasChanged = true;
00067     m_uiRegister = uiRegister;
00068     m_eOption = eOption;
00069     m_pvData = NULL;
00070 
00071     static int aiData[1];
00072     aiData[0] = bEnable ? 1 : 0;
00073     setData( aiData, m_iCount, m_eType );
00074 }

00200 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00201 SpParameter& SpParameter::operator= (const SpParameter& rkConst)
00202 {
00203     delete[] m_acName;
00204     if ( rkConst.m_acName )
00205     {
00206         m_acName = new char[strlen(rkConst.m_acName)+1];
00207         strcpy(m_acName,rkConst.m_acName);
00208     }
00209     else
00210     {
00211         m_acName = NULL;
00212     }
00213 
00214     m_bHasChanged = true;
00215     m_uiRegister = rkConst.m_uiRegister;
00216     m_iSize = rkConst.m_iSize;
00217     m_iCount = rkConst.m_iCount;
00218     m_eType = rkConst.m_eType;
00219     m_eOption = rkConst.m_eOption;
00220 
00221     setData( rkConst.m_pvData, m_iCount, m_eType );
00222     return *this;
00223 }
00224 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 SpParameter::~SpParameter ()
00226 {
00227     delete[] m_acName;
00228 
00229     if(m_iCount > 1)
00230         delete[] m_pvData;
00231     else
00232         delete m_pvData;
00233 
00234     m_pvData = NULL;
00235 }
00236 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237  void SpParameter::setData (
00238     const void* pvSourceData, int iCount, SpParameter::Type eType)
00239 {
00240     m_bHasChanged = true;
00241 
00242     if(m_iCount > 1)
00243         delete[] m_pvData;
00244     else
00245         delete m_pvData;
00246 
00247     m_pvData = NULL;
00248 
00249     m_eType = eType;
00250     m_iSize = getSize( eType );
00251     m_iCount = iCount;
00252 
00253     if(isBoolean())
00254     {
00255         bool* abData = new bool[m_iCount*m_iSize];
00256 
00257         if(!pvSourceData)
00258             memset(abData, 0, sizeof(bool) * m_iCount * m_iSize);
00259         else
00260             memcpy(abData, pvSourceData, sizeof(bool) * m_iCount * m_iSize);
00261 
00262         m_pvData = static_cast<void*>(abData);
00263     }
00264     else if(isInteger())
00265     {
00266         int* aiData = new int[m_iCount*m_iSize];
00267 
00268         if(!pvSourceData)
00269             memset(aiData, 0, sizeof(int) * m_iCount * m_iSize);
00270         else
00271             memcpy(aiData, pvSourceData, sizeof(int) * m_iCount * m_iSize);
00272 
00273         m_pvData = static_cast<void*>(aiData);
00274     }
00275     else if(isFloat())
00276     {
00277         float* afData = new float[m_iCount*m_iSize];
00278 
00279         if(!pvSourceData)
00280             memset(afData, 0, sizeof(float) * m_iCount * m_iSize);
00281         else
00282             memcpy(afData, pvSourceData,sizeof(float)*m_iCount*m_iSize);
00283 
00284         m_pvData = static_cast<void*>(afData);
00285     }
00286 }
00287 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 void SpParameter::setData (const float akData[2][2])
00289 {
00290     if(m_iCount > 1)
00291         delete[] m_pvData;
00292     else
00293         delete m_pvData;
00294 
00295     m_pvData = NULL;
00296     m_bHasChanged = true;
00297 
00298     m_eType = PT_MAT2;
00299     m_iSize = 4;
00300     m_iCount = 1;
00301 
00302     float* afData = new float[m_iCount*m_iSize];
00303 
00304     afData[ 0] = akData[0][0];
00305     afData[ 1] = akData[0][1];
00306 
00307     afData[ 2] = akData[1][0];
00308     afData[ 3] = akData[1][1];
00309 
00310     m_pvData = static_cast<void*>(afData);
00311 }
